briefTitle: REaCT-vascular Access Her2 Negative Vascular Access Strategies for (Neo) Adjuvant Breast Cancer Treatment Without Trastuzumab
officialTitle: Simple, Prospective and Randomized Trial to Obtain Answers to Questions of Standard of Care: Vascular Access Strategies for (Neo) Adjuvant Breast Cancer Treatment Without Trastuzumab: A Study From the REthinking Clinical Trials Program (REaCT-vascular Access Her2 Negative).
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Histologically confirmed primary breast cancer
* Planned to start either FEC-D, AC-D, dose-dense AC-T, TAC, or TC chemotherapy, in the adjuvant or neoadjuvant setting.
* ≥19 years of age
* Able to provide verbal consent

Exclusion Criteria:

• Contraindication to central line placement.
